data.content:
noun
plural -tures
[count] :a person's name written in that person's handwriting
There is a place for your signature at the bottom of the form.
If we can collect 200,000 signatures on our petition, then our candidate will be included on the ballot.
We presented the document to the president for her signature.
[noncount] formal :the act of signing something
The contract requires signature by both parties. [=must be signed by both parties]
The bill passed and went to the governor for signature a week ago.
[count] :something (such as a quality or feature) that is closely associated with someone or something - usually singular
Her latest movie includes the humor and fast pace that have become her signature.
adjective
always used before a noun
closely associated with someone or something :making a person or thing easy to recognize
the chef's signature dish
Respect is her signature song/tune.
The director's new movie is a return to his signature style.

Danh từ
chữ ký
a document with two signatures
một văn kiện với hai chữ ký
sự ký tên
a contract ready for signature
một hợp đồng đã sẵn sàng để ký
